==Trivia==
*{{w|Jauja|Sausa}} also known as ''Jauja'' or ''Shawsha'' is a city and capital of the {{w|Jauja province}} in {{w|Peru}} it is named after the ''Xauxa'' ethnic group inhabiting the area.
